name: Santa Saves Synapcity
description:
We're a creative agency that specialises in creating amazing designs and content in PowerPoint.

So when we saw this page, we thought - CHALLENGE ACCEPTED.

It being Christmas, we bundled it all together to create this game. 

No VBA was hurt (or used) in the making of this game, its just plain 'ole PowerPoint. Contact us if you want to know the hidden secrets.
